HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 3,90 € for GLS home delivery. Free for orders over 40,00 €.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2-5 business days for mainland Croatia. For islands not on the specific delivery schedule, delivery is via Hrvatska pošta within 10 business days.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: No monetary surcharge is mentioned, but delivery to islands has a specific schedule. For islands Krk, Cres, Lošinj, Rab, Murter, Korčula, Pelješac, Vir, Pag, Hvar, Brač, Vis, Pašman, and Ugljan, delivery is available on specific weekdays. For other islands, delivery is via Hrvatska pošta and takes up to 10 business days.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: BOX NOW parcel locker: 2,00 €. GLS parcel locker: 2,00 €. Free for orders over 40,00 €.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Argentum.hr offers home delivery and parcel locker delivery within Croatia. PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by GLS, BOX NOW, and Hrvatska Pošta (for certain islands). PRICING: Home delivery costs 3,90 €, while parcel locker delivery is 2,00 €. Shipping is free for all orders exceeding 40,00 €. DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery time for mainland Croatia is 2-5 business days. Deliveries are not made on weekends. There is a specific weekly delivery schedule for major Croatian islands, and for other islands, delivery is via Hrvatska Pošta and can take up to 10 business days. NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery is offered as a payment method for home delivery, with no surcharge mentioned. The website provides a detailed table for island delivery schedules. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is comprehensive but is located within the lengthy 'General Terms and Conditions' page, which can make it difficult for users to find quickly. A separate, easily accessible shipping information page would improve user experience. Information on express delivery and COD surcharges is not available.
